reviews.text:
food excellent
service excellent - Crystal 
ambiance - music a little loud at times
I came here for a girls night and we loved it. Don't listen to bad reviews. Food was great. Server was nice. Drinks were good! I'd come back for sure.

Omg! Yessss...... 
Never had this style of food before so I was a little bit leery. However, I ordered the Red curry with a side of duck fat chicken wings....
